attributes.action: Ban all petitions that petition against petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A number of petitions are springing up all over the uk, most would be in favour of the majority but were it ever the case that someone should decide to embark upon a petition against the right to petition the opportunity to outlaw such a petition starts here.

Please add your name to this ever growing list and prevent any chance that any government should pass a bill preventing the right to petition in this country.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
